price: Na mfano wa neno ovu ni kama mti muovu, ulio ng'olewa juu ya ardhi. Hauna imara.
arabic: وَمَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبِيثَةٖ كَشَجَرَةٍ خَبِيثَةٍ ٱجۡتُثَّتۡ مِن فَوۡقِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَهَا مِن قَرَارٖ
footnotes: Neno la uwongo baya mfano wake ni kama mti mbaya ulio ng'olewa, umetupwa juu ya ardhi. Haukusimama imara. Hali kadhaalika neno la uwongo lilio kataliwa halina uthabiti, kwa kuwa halikuungwa mkono na hoja.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamathalu kalimatin khabīthatin kashajaratin khabīthatin uj'tuthat min fawqi al-arḍi mā lahā min qarārin
